mapper.sql: id, gmt_created, gmt_updated, login_name, login_pwd, is_remenber_pwd, user_name, sex, age, phone, email, place, code_number, nnlightctl_department_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from nnlightctl_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
